document_name: Green Deal Action Plan (approved by Presidential Circular 2021/15)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/TUR/2021/TUR-2021-08-17-Green Deal Action Plan (approved by Presidential Circular 2021_15)_9e27d77f0da632a129d10b5de0c27cb7.pdf
document_description: This document was redacted by the Ministry of Trade and provides a strategy for achieving a green shift in all sectors of the economy. It further seeks to put Turkey in line with the EU's Green Deal.
